mapper.sql: inEventId, docId, startTime, endTime, createUser, dosageAmount, isCharged, ioDefId, passage, priceId, blood, docType
mapper.select:
select SUM(dosageAmount) from evt_inevent where docId = #{docId}
and ioDefId = #{ioDefId}
select sum(t.dosageAmount) from evt_inevent t where t.docId=#{docId}
select sum(t.value) from evt_egress t where t.docId=#{docId}
select sum(t.value) from evt_egress t where t.docId=#{docId} and t.ioDefId='1'
select sum(t.value) from evt_egress t where t.docId=#{docId} and t.ioDefId='2'
select sum(t.value) from evt_egress t where t.docId=#{docId} and t.ioDefId!='1' and t.ioDefId != '2'
select blood from evt_inevent t where t.docId=#{docId} and blood is not null LIMIT 1
select b.name,x.amount,b.unit,b.dosageUnit from ( select SUM(dosageAmount) amount ,ioDefId from evt_inevent where docId = #{docId} group by ioDefId ) x,bas_io_defination b where x.ioDefId = b.ioDefId
select IFNULL(SUM(dosageAmount),0) from evt_inevent where docId=#{docId}
mapper.insert:
insert into evt_inevent
inEventId,
docId,
startTime,
endTime,
createUser,
dosageAmount,
isCharged,
ioDefId,
passage,
priceId,
blood,
docType,
#{inEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dosageAmount,jdbcType=REAL},
#{isCharged,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ioDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{passage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{priceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{blood,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{docType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update evt_inevent
docId = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dosageAmount = #{dosageAmount,jdbcType=REAL},
isCharged = #{isCharged,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ioDefId = #{ioDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passage = #{passage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priceId = #{priceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
blood = #{blood,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
docType = #{docType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where inEventId = #{inEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update evt_inevent set docId = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createUser = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dosageAmount = #{dosageAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, isCharged = #{isCharged,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ioDefId = #{ioDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passage = #{passage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priceId = #{priceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blood = #{blood,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, docType = #{docType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where inEventId = #{inEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
